header.title: Some Things I’ve Built
header.subtitle: A collection of selected projects showcasing my engineering and design skills.

items.title: HORA Pro
items.descriptions: HR & Employee Management System — Mobile App for Attendance, Shift, and Performance Tracking
items.details: HORA Pro is a comprehensive HR and employee management system that puts workforce control in your hands. Features include shift management, attendance timer, facial recognition, leave requests, text chat, real-time GPS tracking, performance ranking, activity logs, monthly custom reports, anti-fake GPS, and promotions. Trusted by over 100 companies and 1,000 active users, HORA Pro helps improve employee discipline and HR efficiency.

items.title: Smartlink App
items.descriptions: POS & Management System — Flutter, Node.js, MySQL
items.details: Smartlink App is a modern Point of Sales (POS) system integrating sales, stock, reports, and branch management into a single mobile app. Built with Flutter for cross-platform UI and Node.js + MySQL for real-time data. Key features include cashier management, daily reports, and cloud synchronization.

items.title: Company Dashboard
items.descriptions: Web dashboard built with React + Tailwind
items.details: A company dashboard for managing operational data, performance reports, and real-time statistics. Designed responsively and interactively with React and TailwindCSS, allowing access to business insights from desktop and tablet with optimal performance.

items.title: E-commerce App
items.descriptions: Mobile commerce app with real-time synchronization — built with Flutter
items.details: An e-commerce application featuring product catalog, shopping cart, and online payments. Built with Flutter and integrated with Firebase for authentication, database, and real-time notifications. Designed with intuitive UX and modern UI.

items.title: Portfolio Website
items.details: A personal portfolio website showcasing profile, skills, and projects. Built using Next.js with fast routing, Vite as the bundler, and TailwindCSS for consistent styling. Focused on high performance and professional appearance.

items.title: Admin Panel
items.details: A modern administration panel for managing content and users in an internal CMS. Built with React and TypeScript for scalability, and TailwindCSS for a clean and easily customizable interface.

items.title: API Services
items.descriptions: RESTful APIs with Golang + Gin + PostgreSQL
items.details: A collection of RESTful APIs built using Golang with the Gin framework. Designed for high speed and security with PostgreSQL as the main database. Supports JWT authentication, file uploads, and structured logging.
